title: dhaachukO valenaa
sahitya:
dAcukO valenO dAsharathi nIdu daya



anupallavi



cUcuvAralalOna culakane nannu jUci



caraNam 1



kanikaramu kAntapai galigi muddiDu vELa janakaja nAmATa

samayamani balkina



caraNam 2



karagi padamulanu vrAla gani karuNa sEyuvELa bharatuDentO

nannu bhaktuDani balkitE



caraNam 3



nEmamuna paricarya nErpuna bOgaDu vELa saumitri tyAgarAjuni

mATa balkina
